inclusion.criterion: sickle cell anemia patient with severe acute painful crisis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Parental consent and child assent where applicable
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Oxygen saturations below 90% on initial assessment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Altered conscious and mental state that hinders communication
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Current enrollment in another clinical trial involving an investigational drug.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of sickle cell disease and is experiencing severe bone pain. They have had positive history of sickle cell crises since childhood.
